mapper.select: SELECT cp.*,CASE WHEN true THEN (st_distance (point (cp.position_x, cp.position_y),point(#{positionX,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{positionY,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) ) * 111195) END distance FROM `cf_car_park` cp WHERE (st_distance (point (cp.position_x, cp.position_y),point(#{positionX,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{positionY,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) ) * 111195) <= 10000 order by distance asc limit #{page,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT cp.*,CASE WHEN true THEN (st_distance (point (cp.position_x, cp.position_y),point(#{positionX,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{positionY,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) ) * 111195) END distance FROM `cf_car_park` cp WHERE cp.id IN(select shop_id from cf_coupon_link_shop where coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) order by distance asc
select * from cf_car_park where id in(select car_park_id from cf_car_park_link_user where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) limit ${(page-1)*size},${size}
mapper.update: update cf_car_park set used_parking_space_number = used_parking_space_number+(#{changeValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}) where id = #{carParkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
